So it would be possible to do the sorting and packing together.

body:
So it would be possible to do the sorting and packing together.
* An operation with inputs (sequence lengths, batch_order) that outputs 2 alignments(fwd_align, back_align)
* packing is gather(reshape(x, (s*b, d)), fwd_align, axis=0)
* unpacking is reshape(scatter(x, back_align, axis=0, output_Shape=(s*b,d)), (s,b,d))
